text: (minisa kumana tatvayaka sitiyadi vuvada) ohuta idiriyenda, pasupasinda nokadava pæmi‚ya hæki (malayikavarun) kihipa deneku sitinnaha. ovun allahge niyogayan magin ohuva araksa karannaha. minisun (tamange napuru gati gunayangen) tamanva venas nokara ganna turu, niyata vasayenma allahda (ovunta pahala kala varaprasadayan) venas kara harinne næta. allah kumana samuhayanta ho haniyak kirimata adahas kalahot eya valakvannan kisivekut næta. ovunta udav karannanda ohu misa, vena kisivekut næta
